level.heading: Notification of decision and right to judicial review.
level.text: The Mayor's agent shall transmit his or her written decision and any further written statement required by ยง 4-210.12 to the claimant. If the decision is adverse to the claimant, the Mayor's agent shall notify him or her of his or her right to judicial review.
